import React from 'react' import Service from '../../service/Spaces.service' import { Container, Row, Button, Modal } from 'react-bootstrap' import SpaceCard from './Space-card' import EventForm from './Spaces-form' class EventList extends React.Component { constructor() { super() this._service = new Service() this.state = { spaces: [], showModalWindow: false } } componentDidMount = () => this.updateSpacesList() updateSpacesList = () => { this._service.getAllSpaces() .then(allSpacesFromDB => this.setState({ spaces: allSpacesFromDB.data })) .catch(err => console.log("Error", err)) } handleShow = () => this.setState({ showModalWindow: true }) handleClose = () => this.setState({ showModalWindow: false }) render() { return (
